blog.name: giratiempo-hp
blog.title: Giratiempo
blog.description:
Año 2023. Un giratiempo trae personas del pasado hasta el presente. 
El Ministerio de Magia está desmemorizando a magos y muggles del pasado y recluyéndolos, a la espera de poder devolverles a sus épocas de origen.
La OSPP intenta localizar a los llegados de otras épocas antes de que lo haga el Ministerio, para darles una segunda oportunidad.

blog.name: atwarwithdarkandlight
blog.title: nothing, everything, and whatever...
blog.description:
"make it dark, make it grim, make it tough, but then, for the love of god, tell a joke."
 ~Joss Whedon

summary: Ok, so I'm looking for a Harry Potter fic. I can really only remember that Harry had this ability to "see" the history of any...
body: Ok, so I’m looking for a Harry Potter fic. I can really only remember that Harry had this ability to “see” the history of any object he touched. I don’t remember the pairings or the rating or anything, just this one detail. Like every time he touched something he could see everything that had happened to it, where it had been, the impressions people had left on it etc. If anyone could help me find it I would really appreciate it!

reblog.comment: Ok, so I’m looking for a Harry Potter fic. I can really only remember that Harry had this ability to “see” the history of any object he touched. I don’t remember the pairings or the rating or anything, just this one detail. Like every time he touched something he could see everything that had happened to it, where it had been, the impressions people had left on it etc. If anyone could help me find it I would really appreciate it!

Like every time he touched something he could see everything that had happened to it, where it had been, the impressions people had left on it etc. If anyone could help me find it I would really appreciate it!

summary:
I'm not saying this is the BEST day of my life, but I'm also not NOT.
Also, the muggle-repllant charms are working!
Glenfinnan...
body:
I’m not saying this is the BEST day of my life, but I’m also not NOT.

Also, the muggle-repllant charms are working!

Glenfinnan viaduct 😍🧙‍♂️

(In the second pic in the middle towards the back there’s some dark trees and a flat space next to it - that’s Hogwarts!)

(The loch is where Harry and Buckbeak ended PoA with a ride!)

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: jcinkgalore
blog.title: jcink galore
blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
PROTEGO. is a post-potter HP site set in the year 2026. 

 Muggleborns are dying, prisoners have escaped from Azkaban, and...
caption:
PROTEGO. is a post-potter HP site set in the year 2026. 

Muggleborns are dying, prisoners have escaped from Azkaban, and even the Minister of Magic has died under mysterious circumstances. With a new election underway, the political unrest of the wizarding world is at an all time high. No one is safe and no one should be trusted.

Join us! we’re 7 months old and a lot of canon characters and face claims are still available, we also just released a brand new custom skin and site-wide event, we would love to see you around!

INDEX ⛤ WANT ADS ⛤ FACE CLAIMS

summary:
*playing Monopoly* 
Draco: granger I will give you 4 never used beautiful one of a kind peacock feather quills if you $200 in...
body:
*playing Monopoly*

Draco: granger I will give you 4 never used beautiful one of a kind peacock feather quills if you $200 in Monopoly money

Ron: mate it’s a game

Draco: a game I will win!

Hermione: he’s just mad that Harry beat him at candy land

Draco: stupid muggle games

tags: there was also rescuers down under in 1990 but that isn't as well known and isn't a musical
summary:
The Golden Trio's first year began in 1991.
Disney's Beauty and the Beast came out in 1991. These Disney movies all also came...
body:
The Golden Trio’s first year began in 1991.

Disney’s Beauty and the Beast came out in 1991. These Disney movies all also came out while they were at Hogwarts; Aladdin, The Lion King, Pocahontas and Hunchback of Notre Dame (in that order). Hercules came out shortly before they left to hunt horcruxes.

The Little Mermaid came out in ‘89, two years before they started Hogwarts. The muggleborns in Harry’s year (and Harry himself) likely would have known those songs.

Do with this information what you will.

summary:
WORTHY ENOUGH

 lord voldemort has lured fenrir greyback and his savage pack into doing his bidding, but across the Irish sea...
caption:
WORTHY ENOUGH

lord voldemort has lured fenrir greyback and his savage pack into doing his bidding, but across the Irish sea is an untapped resource: a community of werewolves desperate for shelter and security, and to live quiet lives in the shadows. those on the front lines of the war have other plans, and to remain neutral will be a guaranteed struggle.

this and more onhalys, a member-driven au marauders jcink premium site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we are celebrating six months open - now is the perfect time to join our community!

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: WEREWOLF ALLEGIANCES

trail.content_raw:
WORTHY ENOUGH

lord voldemort has lured fenrir greyback and his savage pack into doing his bidding, but across the Irish sea is an untapped resource: a community of werewolves desperate for shelter and security, and to live quiet lives in the shadows. those on the front lines of the war have other plans, and to remain neutral will be a guaranteed struggle.

this and more onhalys, a member-driven au marauders jcink premium site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we are celebrating six months open - now is the perfect time to join our community!

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: WEREWOLF ALLEGIANCES

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
